entities.name: mr borgin
entities.description: Mr Borgin is introduced as a character who is interacting with Mr Malfoy. He is described as having a face where the smile faded slightly when he heard that Mr Malfoy was selling items.

entities.name: mr malfoy
entities.description: Mr Malfoy is introduced as a character who is buying from Mr Borgin but then reveals that he is actually selling. He mentions the Ministry conducting raids and has a list of items at home that might embarrass him.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as an organization that is conducting raids and creating new laws, such as the Muggle Protection Act. It is described as growing more meddlesome.

relationships.description: Mr Malfoy expresses concerns about the Ministry conducting raids and creating new laws.
Mr Borgin mentions that he has not been visited by the Ministry yet, implying that he is a target of their raids.
